alert.note: Alert for Lancaster; York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 11:53AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHERN LANCASTER AND CENTRAL YORK COUNTIES THROUGH 1230 PM EDT... At 1153 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near York, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Columbia, Elizabethtown and Rheems around 1200 PM EDT. Mount Joy, Salunga-Landisville and Mountville around 1205 PM EDT. Manheim and East Petersburg around 1210 PM EDT. Lititz around 1215 PM EDT. Akron, Brickerville and Rothsville around 1220 PM EDT. Ephrata, Reamstown and Denver around 1225 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include York Haven, Schoeneck, Penryn, Reinholds and Lancaster Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for south central Pennsylvania.
